entry.title: Josie and the Pussycat
entry.summary:
Author: insert_cooler_username

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,924Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 582

Summary: â€œGot your letter,â€ he grumbles, coming closer, looming over your supine form. A mass of muscle and leather and anger. â€œIs that what you really want?â€â€œWhat?â€ you snap out. â€œA divorce?â€ You scoff, shaking your head at him. â€œNo, what I want is a husband that will actually come home and raise his kid like he promised. But instead I have someone who follows us around on rooftops and lurks in the shadows thinking heâ€™s some silent protector and not a fucking deadbeat. So yeah, Iâ€™ll settle for a divorce. Itâ€™s the next best thing I have.â€-Your husband left you before he could fuck things up. Too bad he still is when he appears in your life several years later, on the advent of your move from Gotham, and asks to meet his daughter. The past is a hard pill to swallow, but Josie deserves a dad. You just have to make sure you don't pussy out of seeing Jason again. Or, at least, that you don't kill each other.

She always yearned for love and approve from her family, but not anymore she gave up on them like they did her.She was no longer a child desperate for love and approval now she was becoming a woman. Y/n ended up leaving the manor one day and everything started to change.
